security: This document contains personal information, specifically Robert Scheer's date and place of birth, address, employment dates, position, salary, social security number. Releasing this information could violate privacy.
summary: This document is an agent report detailing Robert Scheer's employment at the City University of New York in 1960, including his position, salary, and dates of employment.
summary_one_paragraph: On July 14, 1961, an agent report was submitted regarding Robert Scheer (SSvc 50-29-186, DOB: April 4, 1936, POB: Bronx, New York). Mildred Schoenberg, Secretary at the Payroll Office of City University of New York, provided information from the university records indicating Scheer worked as a Lecturer during the summer session from June 20, 1960, to August 12, 1960, earning $288. The report notes Scheer's address as 653 Britton Street, Bronx, New York, and his Social Security Number as 112-28-1134.
title: Report of Findings: Robert Scheer Employment
